claims.issue_description: Refrigerator stopped cooling overnight, all food spoiling. Compressor making loud noises before failing completely.
claims.notes: Emergency repair approved due to food spoilage risk. Customer has premium coverage.

claims.issue_description: Washing machine drain pump failed, water backing up into laundry room. Error code E03 displayed.
claims.notes: Standard repair covered under policy. Customer reported issue promptly.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Drain pump motor failure, clogged drain hose

claims.issue_description: Dishwasher not cleaning dishes properly, leaving food residue and water spots. Heating element appears to be malfunctioning.
claims.notes: Non-emergency repair. Customer has comprehensive coverage with low deductible.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Heating element failure, rinse aid dispenser clogged

claims.issue_description: Electric oven heating unevenly, burning food on left side while right side remains undercooked. Temperature probe may be faulty.
claims.notes: Repair completed successfully. Heating element and temperature probe replaced.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Lower heating element burned out, temperature probe calibration off
claim_details.completion_notes: Both heating elements tested, oven recalibrated to proper temperature

claims.issue_description: Garbage disposal motor seized up, making grinding noise when switch is turned on. Unit not grinding food waste.
claims.notes: Motor replacement needed. Customer has premium plus coverage with no deductible.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Motor assembly failure, internal grinding mechanism jammed
claim_details.coverage_verification: Fully covered under premium plus plan

claims.issue_description: Central air conditioning unit not cooling house, blowing warm air. Compressor not engaging properly.
claims.notes: Claim under review - unit is 8 years old, checking coverage limits and exclusions.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Compressor failure suspected, refrigerant leak possible

claims.issue_description: Microwave sparking inside chamber, turntable not rotating. Safety concern - unit unplugged immediately.
claims.notes: Emergency safety repair approved immediately. Customer advised not to use unit.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Waveguide cover damaged, turntable motor failure

claims.issue_description: Electric water heater not heating water to proper temperature, lukewarm water only. Possible heating element failure.
claims.notes: Standard water heater repair covered. Customer in Miami area with tropical climate plan.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Upper heating element failure, thermostat calibration needed

claims.issue_description: Washing machine vibrating violently during spin cycle, moving across laundry room floor. Possible shock absorber failure.
claims.notes: Non-urgent repair. Customer has multiple appliances covered under premium plan.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Shock absorbers worn out, leveling feet adjustment needed

claims.issue_description: Ice maker stopped producing ice three days ago, water dispenser still functional. Ice maker light indicates it's on but no ice production.
claims.notes: Ice maker repair covered. Non-essential function, scheduled for next available slot.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Ice maker assembly malfunction, water filter may need replacement

claims.issue_description: Dishwasher not starting when button pressed, control panel lights up but no water fills or motor sounds.
claims.notes: Claim rejected - customer found tripped circuit breaker was the cause. No appliance malfunction.

claim_details.damage_assessment: No appliance damage - electrical supply issue
claim_details.rejection_reason: Issue resolved by customer - electrical supply problem, not appliance malfunction

claims.issue_description: Electric dryer not heating, clothes coming out damp after full cycle. Heating element suspected to be burned out.
claims.notes: New claim submitted, awaiting initial review and coverage verification.

claims.issue_description: Central air conditioning system not responding to thermostat commands, no cooling despite proper temperature settings and power supply.
claims.notes: High priority due to California heat wave. Customer has tech professional plan with extended coverage.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Thermostat control board failure, possible refrigerant leak

claims.issue_description: Washing machine agitator not functioning properly, clothes not getting adequately cleaned despite full wash cycles.
claims.notes: Family with children needs washing machine operational. Customer prefers Spanish-speaking technician.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Agitator assembly worn out, drive belt may need replacement
claim_details.coverage_verification: Covered under family home protection plus

claims.issue_description: Refrigerator producing excessive noise and temperature fluctuations affecting medical supply storage requirements.
claims.notes: Priority repair due to medical supply storage needs. Professional standard protection covers medical use cases.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Compressor motor bearing failure, condenser fan motor issues

claims.issue_description: Dishwasher detergent dispenser not opening during wash cycle, dishes not getting properly cleaned.
claims.notes: Non-urgent repair. Customer has ultimate protection plan with zero deductible.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Detergent dispenser mechanism jammed, door latch sensor malfunction
claim_details.coverage_verification: Fully covered under ultimate protection plan

claims.issue_description: Electric dryer overheating clothes, causing damage to fabrics and potential fire hazard.
claims.notes: Safety concern addressed immediately. Customer advised not to use dryer until repair completed.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Thermostat failure causing overheating, thermal fuse blown
claim_details.coverage_verification: Partially covered - age limit considerations apply

claims.issue_description: Gas water heater pilot light intermittently going out, resulting in inconsistent hot water supply.
claims.notes: Desert climate plan covers gas appliance issues. Customer works early hours, prefers morning appointments.

claim_details.damage_assessment: Thermocouple sensor failure, gas valve control issues
claim_details.coverage_verification: Covered under desert climate protection plan
